alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 01 at 4:48AM MST until December 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected this morning, primarily in the Mission Valley. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches, with snowfall rates exceeding one inch per hour. Lesser amounts of 1 to 2 inches expected in the Flathead Valley. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow showers will bring 1 to 2 inches of additional snowfall this afternoon. * WHERE...Flathead Lake, Flathead Valley, Mission Valley, and Polson. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 11 AM MST this morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 11 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
